cab.content: Military Secret. U03Ft *om Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,2Uh February 1920.(Received 25th.)1 2438. Malleson wires 20th February. Tashkend Wireless Telegraphy last night was asking Peshawar for (1) news about Waziristan operations, (2) how are peace negotiations with Afghanistan proceeding, and promising summary to Peshawar of Press news.
